| History                 = The '''August Dragon Clan''' was a [[Triads (Earth-616)|criminal organization]] active in both [[Toronto]] and [[Montreal]], [[Canada]], as well as in [[New York City]]. During the leadership of [[Bruce Lam (Earth-616)|Bruce Lam]] it was moving $5 million in narcotics a month. Bruce Lam attended a gang summit at the [[Manhattan Tower]] in New York City involving crime syndicate figures from across the nation.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 61}}. They were confronted by the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] and slain at the tower.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 23}}

Seeking revenge for the murder of Bruce Lam, members of the August Dragon Clan headed to the town where the Punisher was locked up. Along with members from other gangs, they took out the local Sheriff department. Ending in a confrontation with the Punisher who had been released from the cell, which they lost.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 63|64}}{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 25}}
